title: How megalodon's teeth evolved into the 'ultimate cutting tools'

title_detail.value: How megalodon's teeth evolved into the 'ultimate cutting tools'

summary: Megalodon, the largest shark that ever lived, is known only from its gigantic bladelike teeth. But these teeth took millions of years to evolve into their final, iconic form.

summary_detail.value: Megalodon, the largest shark that ever lived, is known only from its gigantic bladelike teeth. But these teeth took millions of years to evolve into their final, iconic form.
